add_category_hint: Add a new category by typing category
siteName_hint: Site name is added to site meta data
siteTitle_hint: Site title is added to site meta data
siteDescription_hint: Description of your site. One or two sentences.
domainName_hint: Domain name is added to all site canonials and meta data
storageName_hint: Name of project storage for assets. Ex. savikuja.appsopt.com
startYear_hint: Start year is added to site footer copyright
displayName_hint: Display name is used when publishing posts and reaction within community
language_hint: Select site language. Will affect how ex. category pages are generated
gtagId_hint: Provide site Google Analytics GTAG ID to enable Google Analytics
adsenseId_hint: Provide site Google AdSense ID to enable AdSense
disqusId_hint: Provide Disqus ID to enable Disqus commenting on articles and store items
emailUrl_hint: Contact email will be added to site footer
adminEmail_hint: Google email used for sending server-side emails
adminEmailPassword_hint: Usually an application password generated by Google
twitterUrl_hint: Twitter link will be added to site footer
facebookUrl_hint: Facebook link will be added to site footer
instagramUrl_hint: Instagram link will be added to site footer
pinterestUrl_hint: Pinterest link will be added to site footer
youtubeUrl_hint: Youtube link will be added to site footer
addUser_email_hint: User must sign in with this email address to complete registration to site
fileTitle_hint: What is the title for this media? Added to SEO!
fileCaption_hint: Description of the media. Added to SEO!
advertiserTitle_hint: Title will be shown when user hovers their mouse over link
advertiserName_hint: Company or brand who is selling the product behind the link
advertiserLink_hint: Final link where user is redirected
article_title_hint: Main title will be added to article meta title
article_slug_hint: Slug is the path of your article. Use only letters, numbers and normal hyphens. No Scandic letters. Ex: 'example-article-2'
article_description_hint: Describe your article in onw or two sentences
article_image_description_hint: Image description will be displayed under the image
linkText_hint: Text inside the link (displayed as underlined blue)
categoryPageDesc: All posts and articles in category
media_text:
Cover image should be 1200x630 pixels according to OG:IMAGE standards and as small in size as possible.
Normal article image should be as small as possible in size.
Profile image should be square 512x512 pixels and as small as possible by size.
remove_category_dialog_description: Removing this category will also remove it from all the articles it is in. Are you sure you want to do this?
remove_content_dialog_description: Are you sure you want to remove this content?
sponsorTitle_hint: Title to be displayed in sponsor Ad
sponsor_html_hint: Entire text html for sponsor Ad
externalLinkUrl_hint: Set the URL for a button in header
externalLinkTitle_hint: What title appearn in the button in header
